name: John Roach
description: John Roach appears in the EntoVerse! How will he measure up to this world?

name: Luke Springer
description: As a grasshopper with great resolve, Luke usually keeps to himself but can ejoy the company of similar-minded people.

name: Ayanna Apis
abilities: Flight, Pollen Cultivation, Honey Forging, Stinger Blasts
description: Very goal-oriented, she tends to overbook and put other's needs before herself. While this is a noble trait, she struggles with balancing and can be very one track minded. Coming from the Apis hive, she is a powerful insect which allows her to have the task of pollen collector
